item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-07-27
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• Is twitpic down for anyone else? #
  • The new Tron Legacy movie sounds neat and all, but can I get the new Daft Punk soundtrack for it NOW? Please? #
  • RT: Programmatically Creating Website Thumbnails (via @rbazinet) #
  • RT @boingboing Time-lapse footage of Disneyland's construction, for the first time #Disney #youtube (via @Kneon) #
  • Gorgeous pics of Disneyland Paris - #

Powered by Twitter Tools.
